definitions.definition: Not marked by discrimination or discernment ; ( by extension ) confused , promiscuous .
Without care in making distinctions , thoughtless .
examples: How can anyone be so indiscriminate in making friends as he is?

main_definition: ( of things ) Not marked by discrimination or discernment ; ( by extension ) confused , promiscuous .
secondary_definitions: ( of a person ) Without care in making distinctions , thoughtless .
